desc: 224 Equestrian has created Dri-Cool & Ride-Cool Technology! A brand new line of Horse + Rider Performance Products promoting increased airflow. Whether you're a Jockey, Eventing, Competing or a Trainer - Our mission is to make both you & your horse safer, cooler, and more comfortable; so you can focus on… RIDING!

layout.text: This highly breathable, compression-resistant under vest allows air to flow, reducing the heat buildup under your Equestrian Vest, transferring moisture away from the body to reduce wetness.
